faqs.question: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 months in advance for weddings and large events. For smaller events, 2-4 weeks notice is usually sufficient.

faqs.question: Do you provide vegetarian and vegan options?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a wide variety of vegetarian and vegan menu options. Our chefs can customize menus to accommodate any dietary restrictions or preferences.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 30 days or more before the event receive a full refund. Cancellations made 15-29 days before receive a 50% refund. Cancellations made less than 15 days before are non-refundable.

faqs.question: Can I customize the menu?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We encourage menu customization. Our team will work with you to create a menu that perfectly suits your event and preferences.

faqs.question: Do you provide staff for the event?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our packages include professional service staff. The number of staff members depends on your package and guest count.

faqs.question: bhai yar pricing or faqs ko bi chack karo ya work nahi kar raha
faqs.answer: bhai yar pricing or faqs ko bi chack karo ya work nahi kar raha bhai yar pricing or faqs ko bi chack karo ya work nahi kar raha
